ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.controller.remote

Class RemoteTaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.controller.remote.RemoteTaskController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteSynchronizedTaskController

    public class RemoteTaskController
extends Object
implements TaskController
    Controller for the view (as in MVC-Pattern) that provides methods to deal with a remote virtual disk server. This controller uses an RMI Server on the host system to invoke commands on the virtual disk.

        Specified by:

        destinationPaths - an array of paths for the virtual disk, representing the destinations of the move

      • createSearchTask

        public UpdateableTask<Entry[]> createSearchTask(String term,
                                       boolean isRegex,
                                       boolean checkFiles,
                                       boolean checkFolders,
                                       boolean isCaseSensitive,
                                       boolean checkChildren,
                                       Entry... parents)
        Description copied from interface: TaskController
        Creates a task to search for the given term inside the given parents.
        Specified by:
        createSearchTask in interface TaskController
        Parameters:
        term - the search term
        isRegex - true if term is a regex, otherwise false
        checkFiles - true if files should be checked
        checkFolders - true if folders should be checked
        isCaseSensitive - true if term is case sensitive
        checkChildren - true if children and subfolders should be checked
        parents - list of parents to search in
        Returns:
        task to execute the search
